Data: please also list samples and/or materials that you will use in the table and describe their management, these are considered physical data in a DMP
Preservation: Note that RDR is a data repository for data publishing which preserves data as well, but can't be used only to preserve data see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr, for other archiving solutions see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en

24/06/2024
FWO expects DMPs to follow the Flemish Standard DMP template. You can find this template with guidance in DMPonline.be, or on the FWO website with more information about the FWO DMP requirements (https://www.fwo.be/en/about-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan-dmp/)
